tool_description: Get user details and scores for competitive coding platforms - Codeforces, Codechef, SPOJ, Interviewbit
title: Competitive Programming Platform

api_list.name: Codechef
api_list.description: Get user details and scores of CodeChef users.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://competitive-programming-platform.p.rapidapi.com/codechef/{username}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "competitive-programming-platform.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
